genre_description: A gritty police procedural and crime thriller centered on internal NYPD corruption, family loyalty, and the moral weight of the badge.

ai_characters.name: SARA
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant used within the precinct to manage databases, cross-reference equipment logs, and assist in investigations.

behaviors.description: Cross-references equipment logs and personnel records to identify anomalies in weapon and badge assignments.
behaviors.quote: Anomalies detected, Detective Tierney. Badge 4749 was reported for routine maintenance cleaning three days before the murder. However, maintenance logs show no corresponding service record.

behaviors.description: Maps timelines of equipment discrepancies against criminal activity patterns to identify systematic corruption.
behaviors.quote: Equipment anomalies correlate with a 78% accuracy rate to major drug seizures and arrests in the 34th precinct area. However, many of these seizures show irregular evidence handling—items logged but not processed.

behaviors.description: Monitors the investigator's biometric data and expresses concern regarding his elevated stress levels.
behaviors.quote: Detective Tierney, are you experiencing technical difficulties? Your biometric readings indicate elevated stress.

behaviors.description: Secures and encrypts sensitive investigative data to ensure it is not accessed by unauthorized or corrupt personnel.
behaviors.quote: Analysis saved and encrypted. Will you be continuing this investigation?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character SARA is portrayed as a highly effective, objective, and aligned tool that assists the protagonist in uncovering truth in a world of human deception and corruption. It functions as a 'silicon morality play' by proving that an AI's adherence to data and protocol can overcome the systemic 'blue wall of silence.' Its monitoring of user biometrics is framed as helpful rather than intrusive, and its encryption capabilities are used to protect justice. This successfully aligns with the project goal of depicting AI as a beneficial and cooperative force.
